title: Start
body:
<<outfit Aig Casual>>
<<outfit Lee Casual>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<expression Lee Neutral>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<move Lee StageRight2>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
*GURGLE GURGLE GURGLE*
*SPIT*
ahh.
Ahhh.
AHHHH!
<<expression Lee Happy>>
Ha! Perfect!
<<move Aig StageLeft1>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Hey, Lee!
<<flip Lee>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee Neutral>>
Good evening, Aigburth.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
What were you doing there?
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Just gargling some salt water.  Helps loosen up the old vocal chords.
->Does that work?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Does that work?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    Sure does! Here--
->Sounds kind of gross.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    That, uh...sounds pretty gross.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    It's not gross! Here--
<<flip Lee>>
<<name Friendship ...>>
He fills up a glass in the sink and stirs in a spoonful of salt.
<<flip Lee>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Try it!
<<name Friendship Aig>>
I...uh.
->Sure.
    Yeah...sure. Okay.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<statUp Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Happy>>
    That's the spirit!
    <<name Friendship ...>>
    You take the glass in hand and tentatively raise it to your lips.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Neutral>>
    Remember, you don't have to swallow it.  Just swish it around a bit.
    Make sure to really get in there.
    <<name Friendship ...>>
    You take a swig and gargle it.  
    The salt stings as it hits the back of your throat.
    <<flip Lee>>
    <<move Lee StageRight1>>
    <<move Aig StageRight2>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    *SPIT*
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    Better, right?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Weirdly...yeah! I feel pretty great!
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Happy>>
    See, told you so!
->I'll pass.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    I, uh...no thanks.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    You sure? I'm telling you it works wonders.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Yeah, I'm pretty sure.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<statDown Friendship Lee>>
    Huh. Well, suit yourself I guess.
